headlines.headline: 'The Hoop Collective': Episodes of Brian Windhorst's NBA podcast
headlines.description: From breaking news to the latest intel from around the NBA, here are the biggest highlights from Brian Windhorst's "The Hoop Collective" podcast.

headlines.headline: Luka passing up final shot vs. Magic an issue? Stephen A. weighs in
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith reacts to the Lakers' final possession Tuesday night vs. the Magic and answers whether he has an issue with Luka Doncic passing up the final shot.

headlines.headline: LeBron on Lakers' last play vs. Magic: Luka had a 'great look'
headlines.description: LeBron James explains what he saw during the Lakers' last play vs. the Magic on Tuesday night.

headlines.headline: MacMahon: LeBron and Luka have 'no kind of chemistry'
headlines.description: Tim MacMahon reacts to the Lakers' final play vs. the Magic on Tuesday night.

headlines.headline: Kobe Bryant and the secret history of the black mamba
headlines.description: In late 2002, Nike began creating a global campaign featuring the black mamba -- and presented it to an NBA superstar. That star was not Kobe Bryant.

headlines.headline: Botched final play between Luka, LeBron dooms Lakers vs. Magic
headlines.description: The Lakers lost to the Magic 110-109 on Tuesday after a botched sidelines out-of-bounds play between LeBron James and Luka Doncic in the final seconds failed to produce a quality shot.

headlines.headline: Stephen A.'s message to Steelers GM Omar Khan: 'Do your job!'
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith says Steelers GM Omar Khan needs to find a quarterback rather than waiting on Aaron Rodgers.

headlines.headline: Top NFL draft prospect Reese: 'I'm an outside linebacker/edge'
headlines.description: Ohio State star Arvell Reese, one of the top prospects in April's NFL draft, declared himself an "outside linebacker/edge" rusher during media interviews at the combine Wednesday.

headlines.headline: Jaguars, Commanders host teams for NFL's 3 London games
headlines.description: The Jaguars and Commanders will be the host teams for the NFL's three London games in 2026, the league announced Wednesday morning.

headlines.headline: Should J.J. McCarthy be worried about his QB1 status?
headlines.description: Domonique Foxworth and Damien Woody ponder J.J. McCarthy's future with the Vikings and what the Aaron Rodgers rumors might mean for him.

headlines.headline: Why the Vikings are the best fit for Aaron Rodgers
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew agrees the Vikings are the top fit for Aaron Rodgers heading into his 22nd year in the NFL.

headlines.headline: Predicting all 32 NFL starting quarterbacks for 2026 season
headlines.description: Will Kirk Cousins go back to Minnesota? Could Kyler Murray join the AFC? Let's predict who will start for every NFL team in the 2026 season.

headlines.headline: Penguins' Sidney Crosby put on IR, to miss at least 4 weeks
headlines.description: Pittsburgh Penguins captain Sidney Crosby will miss at least four weeks after he was moved to injured reserve, the team announced Wednesday.

headlines.headline: Post-Olympics NHL Bubble Watch: Every team's playoff chances
headlines.description: With the medals awarded, the sprint is on to the end of the regular season.

headlines.headline: Ottawa in action against Detroit after overtime victory
headlines.description: Detroit Red Wings (33-19-6, in the Atlantic Division) vs. Ottawa Senators (28-22-7, in the Atlantic Division)

headlines.headline: Sharks bring losing streak into home matchup with the Flames
headlines.description: Calgary Flames (23-27-6, in the Pacific Division) vs. San Jose Sharks (27-24-4, in the Pacific Division)

headlines.headline: Canadiens host the Islanders in Eastern Conference play
headlines.description: New York Islanders (32-21-5, in the Metropolitan Division) vs. Montreal Canadiens (32-17-8, in the Atlantic Division)

headlines.headline: Blackhawks visit the Predators, try to end road losing streak
headlines.description: Chicago Blackhawks (22-26-9, in the Central Division) vs. Nashville Predators (26-24-7, in the Central Division)
